Text:
The subtitles on this are HARD-CODED, meaning you cannot turn them off. If you don't want to see a bunch of Swedish subtitles at the bottom of this movie, then do not download this copy. 

@BaZZe2010: Don't EVER hard-code your subtitles. It makes it impossible to turn them off.
BaZZe is obviously swedish and hardcodes his rips because of his love to the swedish language
@Dizzious, there are plenty of torrents with no subs to, DL one of those instead and stop complaining at something that obviously wasn't meant for you.
